The KIMEDS Ontology: Overview back to ToC

This ontology has the following classes and properties.

Classes

  • human
  • immortals
  • mortal
  • unknown

The KIMEDS Ontology: Description back to ToC

"The KIMEDS ontology."

Cross-reference for The KIMEDS Ontology classes, object properties and data properties back to ToC

This section provides details for each class and property defined by The KIMEDS Ontology.

Classes

  • human
  • immortals
  • mortal
  • unknown

humanc back to ToC or Class ToC

IRI: http://www.semanticweb.org/piotr/ontologies/2023/8/untitled-ontology-56#Human

has super-classes
mortal c

immortalsc back to ToC or Class ToC

IRI: http://www.semanticweb.org/piotr/ontologies/2023/8/untitled-ontology-56#Immortals

has super-classes
living thing c
has sub-classes
unknown c
is disjoint with
mortal c

mortalc back to ToC or Class ToC

IRI: http://www.semanticweb.org/piotr/ontologies/2023/8/untitled-ontology-56#Mortal

has super-classes
living thing c
has sub-classes
human c
is disjoint with
immortals c

unknownc back to ToC or Class ToC

IRI: http://www.semanticweb.org/piotr/ontologies/2023/8/untitled-ontology-56#Unknown

has super-classes
immortals c
